ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: The Future
ygData.msgSnippet: I build my own machines and run EQ very well.  The price is way less than $1700 and they are fully upgradeable :)  I recently built one for my husband so that
ygData.messageBody:
I build my own machines and run EQ very well. The price is way less than
$1700 and they are fully upgradeable :) I recently built one for my husband
so that we could play together. Case, 19" monitor, keyboard, optical mouse,
motherboard w/ AMD 1.3 processor, Audigy MP3 sound card, GEforce 3 video
card, 512 megs of ram, 60 gig hard drive, CD/RW drive and speakers.....
around $1000. There are also advantages to being able to load only the
software you want on a blank hard drive.

It's really not hard to build your own :)

Kanalyn 25 Druid
Allilee 18 Ranger
Jenayla 6 Shaman
Tarew Marr
